freenet.node
Interface RequestClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookmarkManager, ExtJarUpdater, FProxyToadlet, HighLevelSimpleClientImpl, MainJarUpdater, NodeARKInserter, NodeUpdater, OfferedKeysList, PluginJarUpdater, RevocationChecker, UpdateOverMandatoryManager, USKManager
public interface RequestClient

Must be implemented by any client object returned by SendableRequest.getClient(). Mostly this is for scheduling, but it does have one key purpose: to identify whether a request is persistent or not.

Author:
toad

          Is this request persistent? **Must not change!**
